review: A timeless classic. The characters and moral lessons stay with you forever.
Thought-provoking and chilling. A must-read for anyone interested in politics or history.
Beautiful writing, but I found the plot a bit slow. Still worth reading for the symbolism.

bookTitle: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
review: Incredibly insightful and engaging. It changed how I view human history.
Very practical and easy to apply. I'm already seeing changes in my daily habits.
